alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 23 at 5:09AM MDT until April 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. New snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Westerly wind gusting 25 to 35 mph with localized gusts to 45 mph. * WHERE...East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, including along Interstate 80. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Road conditions will improve by afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Windy conditions, along with wet snow and cold temperatures, could be harmful to young livestock.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
